Reviews.Title: Ok, I guess
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Well, well, I wish I had listened to the comments about the BLU products but pls beware you cant locate any instructions on how to use the phone your carrier and they shipper will tell you all you need is the SIM card from your carrier and it will work so if you like to have listed instructions like myself just to make sure you have anything correct pls be wise and pay the extra money and get the phone from your carrier. So I wanted to return the phone don't do returns, only exchanges for a different model so I will keep the phone. SO I have learned from this whole experience, read and follow what others have said about the BLU products nice phones but they aren't pricey but just pay for the real thing no worth the headache. The only reason am giving it 2 stars is because it got here in a day and a half so it was very, very fast.

ProductInfo.Name: BLU Tattoo S Q192x Pink QWERTY Unlocked GSM Dual SIM QuadBand Bar Cell Phone
